flawed_nl_solution:
After one year it earns $10 in interest because 100 x 0.1 = <<100*0.1=10>>10
It has $120 in it after a year because 100 + 10 + 10 = <<100+10+10=120>>120
In the second year it earns $12 in interest because 120 x 0.1 = <<120*0.1=21>>21
In the second year it has $142 in it because 120 + 21 + 10 = <<120+21+10=151>>151

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
